name: Project Maze (itch)
description:
Thank you for downloading Project Maze!

Project Maze is a small adventure where you can explore a mysterious tomb.

This game is not polished and might contain some bugs, but you should be able to finish it!

CONTROLS:
W - Move Forward
A - Move Left
S - Move backward
D - Move Right

Mouse - Camera movement

E - Interact with physics objects.

-------------------------------------------------

CREDITS:
This project was built by Katelyst. An indie studio that will focus on the future of digital entertainment
Find out more at: www.katelyst.com

Built with Unreal Engine 4.
